title: Landoll Drexel SL30 3000lb Electric Forklift With Swing Mast, Charger Included
item_description:
Landoll Drexel SL30 3000lb Electric Forklift With Swing Mast, Charger Included

  • Manufacturer: Landoll
  • Model: Drexel SL30
  • Load Capacity: 3000lbs
  • Fuel Type: Electric
  • Mast Type: Three Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 86
  • Truck Weight: 14,825
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Maximum Lift Height: 198”
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes

Removal Note: This lot is only available for removal July 14-18, 2025, from 9:00AM to 3:30PM each day. Removal appointments are required for pickup.
